name: 蔡哲雄
objective:
介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的方法與應用。
1. Introduction to CAD/CAE/CAM system
2. Coordinate transformations
3. Curve modeling
4. Surface modeling
5. Solid modeling
6. CNC machine tools and part programming
7. Process planning for sculptured surface machining
8. Tool path generation methods for sculptured surface machining
9. Multi-axis machining
10.NC-code post-processing
11.Geometric cutting simulation and verification
schedule:
第一週   Introduction to CAD/CAE/CAM system
第二週   Coordinate transformations
第三週   Curve modeling
第四週   Curve modeling
第五週   Surface modeling
第六週   Surface modeling
第七週   Solid modeling
第八週   CNC machine tools and part programming
第九週    (期中考)
第十週   Process planning for sculptured surface machining
第十一週 Tool path generation for roughing
第十二週 Tool path generation for finishing
第十三週 Tool path generation for finishing
第十四週 Multi-axis machining
第十五週 Multi-axis machining
第十六週 NC-code postprocessing
第十七週 Geometric cutting simulation and verification
第十八週  (期末考)
scorePolicy:
1. 平時小考       30%
2. 期中考         25%
3. 期末考         25%
4. 期末實作及報告 20%
